entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 60%
